dct_title_s: Energy map of Mexico / produced by Petroleum Economist, in association with Fermaca ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush.
dct_description_sm: "Published November 2018"--Panel Relief and depths shown by shading. Shows oil fields; oil pipelines; oil pipelines planned or under construction; oil refineries; tanker terminals; FPSO (Floating, Production, Storage and Offloading) and FSO (Floating, Storage and Offloading) vessels; oil storage facilities; gas fields; gas pipelines; gas pipelines planned or under construction; products pipelines; products pipelines planned or under construction; LNG import terminals; speculative CNG import terminals; gas processing plants; power stations by fuel type; 400 kV transmission cables; 225 kV transmission cables; interconnectors; main conurbations; administrative centres; international and state boundaries. Panel title. "Petroleum Economist Cartographic." "Satellite derived imagery courtesy of: CGG NPA Satellite Mapping." Includes legend, 2 insets, 2 ancillaries, 7 graphs and tables, text, color photographs on panel, and color advertisements on panel. Insets: Zona Marina, Bahia de Campeche -- North Mexico gas. Ancillaries: Oil and gas trade from/to Mexico -- Projected electric demand growth by region 2016-2030.
